code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{InputText}from'primereact/inputtext';import{Button}from'primereact/button';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ToDoList=()=>{const[tasks,setTasks]=useState(['apple','orange']);const handleAddTask=()=>{const moreItem=document.getElementById('item-id').value;document.getElementById('item-id').value='';setTasks([...tasks,moreItem]);};const handleDeleteTask=index=>{setTasks(tasks.filter((_,i)=>i!==index));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"TO DO LIST"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputText,{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter Task",id:"item-id"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{label:"Submit",icon:"pi pi-check",iconPos:"right"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddTask,children:"Add Task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tasks.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleDeleteTask(index),children:item},index))})})]});};export default ToDoList;
